titles.title: There's A Change Made, Since I've Been Born

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a change made, since I've been born.
There's a change made, since I've been born.
There's a change made, since I've been born.
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The things I used to do, I don't do them any more (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's a change made, since I've been born (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The people I used to know, don't know me any more (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
There's a change made, since I've been born again (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
The book I never read, I read it more and more (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
There's a change made, since I've been born again (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
The me I used to be, I'm not that any more (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
There's a change made, since I've been born again (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
The places I used to go, don't go there any more (3x)
There's a change made since I've been born again.
